data.text: @kencoker2012 @MPWife_ You were supposed to get married today?

@MPWife_ Many thanks Lady S; wedding rescheduled. We may be feeling better..just had an argument about first past the post versus PR..(I believe in the former.) Now moved on to https://t.co/m6VSGRy0Jt
@kencoker2012 Oh Dear Ken, I am sorry about COVID and the wedding. Glad you woke up though, you don’t want to go shopping with Sir H, he doesn’t understand the word ‘limit’ !
Have you read this @GillsLes? It's fantastic..
